Loosely based on: <https://southernbite.com/black-eyed-pea-cakes/>

Black eyed peas can be canned or cooked using the Perini Ranch recipe: <https://www.farmhousevineyard.com/recipe/perini-ranch-black-eyes-peas/> 




## Ingredients

Black eyed peas: 

- 1 lb Dried Farmhouse Vineyards Black Eyed Peas
- 1/4 cup Bacon Grease
- 1 tbsp Salt

Bean griddle cake: 

- 4c black eyed beans (already cooked, I used the pereni farmhouse recipe)
- ~8tbs flour
- ~8tbs corn meal 
- ~4 TBS bread crumbs 
- 1-4 tsp smoked paprika 
- 1-4 tsp cumin 
- 1 egg 
- 1 small onion + 1 glove garlic sauteed to clearness 

Sauce: 

- 1/2 cup mayo 
- Salt 
- Pepper 
- 1/2 tsp Cajun seasoning 
- 1 garlic clove, SMASHED 

## Instructions

Make the beans: 

1. Pre-soak dried peas for a minimum of 2 hours before cooking.
2. Adding water when needed.
3. Add bacon grease and salt.
4. Heat on medium high heat and stir occasionally.
5. Scoop out the foam thatâ€™s at the top of the pot.
6. Heat to 165 degrees and until peas are tender.

Make the cakes and dipping sauce: 

- Mix ingredients
- Spoon roughly 3 tbsp of batter into hot pan
- 2 min front side, flip and 1.5-2 min back side
